name: Taqua
overview: Taqua, LLC manufactures and supplies switching systems and applications. It offers switching systems, including packet interface card, broadband interface card, T1 interface card, line termination card, and mobile interface card; TaquaWorks, a VoIP applications platform that allows service providers to offer revenue-generating enhanced voice applications; and Taqua MobileWorks, an integrated wireless and wireline solution. The company also provides digital loops, carriers, MGCP/NCS gateways/MTA, PBXs, switches, SIP feature server/gateways, SIP voice mail system, call announcement servers, service platforms, billing meditation software, alarm monitoring systems, ATM switches, caps and grows, smart phones, SS7 networks/STPs, CALEA collection systems, VoIP gateways/centrix, remote access and conferencing servers, packet cable CMTS, SIP CPE/ATA, voicemail platforms, IADs, and SIP CPE/ATA. In addition, it offers wireline solutions, wireless solutions, unified messaging solutions, portal services, residential family services, and desktop integration services; professional services, including project management/network evaluation and design, pre-deployment testing, switching installation and legacy switching decommissioning, migrating subscribers, and training and marketing support; and business services, including hosted PBX, front office, call center, and conferencing and collaboration. Taqua, LLC has strategic partnerships with BroadSoft, Equinox Information Systems, and GENBAND. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Richardson, Texas. It has research and development locations in Hyannis, Massachusetts; and Richardson, Texas.
